articles.description: Two members of the RPS Treehouse search once again for the "2" in Overwatch 2's second closed beta. and find... something?
articles.content: Liam and I thought Overwatch 2's first PVP beta was fine! It was just hard to say just how much of that came down to the "2" in its title. We jumped back into its ongoing second beta, in the hopes th… [+5032 chars]
